response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us at $15,000, but considering its importance to you, we're willing to negotiate. We propose selling it to you for $12,000. This price not only ensures a fair deal for both parties but also allows you to secure this valuable asset at a reasonable discount. We believe this is a win-win situation and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
